name: Every Step Has A Price - Demo
name_original: Every Step Has A Price - Demo
description:
This game was made during a College GameJam with the Theme "Everything Has A Price", we incorporated this idea by making a puzzle game where each movement would cost you 1 health until you either won or died!

Credits:

Kian Oldis (Leading Programmer)

Scott Parry-Jones (Lead Developer/Level Designer)

Luke Brown (Lead Artist)

Eira Adey-Davies (Lead Music Designer)

Oliver Young (Lead Story Writer)
